import ScreenHeading from "../../utilities/ScreenHeading/ScreenHeading"; import "./Portfolio.css"; import "swiper/css"; import Animations from "../../utilities/Animations"; import ScrollService from "../../utilities/ScrollService"; export default function Portfolio(props) { let fadeInScreenHandler = (screen) => { if (screen.fadeInScreen !== props.id) return; Animations.animations.fadeInScreen(props.id); }; const fadeInSubscription = ScrollService.currentScreenFadeIn.subscribe(fadeInScreenHandler); return (
